Original:
公館的寶藏酒吧🥺 趁學生都在放暑假大家趕快來🤣

今天喝了諾曼第夏天，整杯很清甜喝的時候可以聞到蘋果肉桂的香氣好喜歡～

離開時老闆還給了Bye Bye Shot 是精華版的桂花巷茶樓，金萱融合的超讚的，說喜歡這個濃度下次來也可以跟他說🤣 另外還有香片茶的組合也好特別！

餐點吃了西班牙海鮮燉飯有魚肉、蝦子、花枝帶一點微辣很好吃，不知不覺就吃完了🤣

三人派對炸雞有孜然香料醃過，味道很香肉也很嫩❤️❤️❤️

下次來想試試甜點😆

Mansion's treasure bar

I drank the summer of Norman today. When the whole cup is very sweet, you can smell the aroma of apple cinnamon. I like it ~

When he left, the boss also gave Bye Bye Shot as the essence version of the osmanthus alleys. Jin Xuan fused and praised. He said that he liked this concentration next time you can tell him that there is a combination of fragrant tea tea!

The meal ate the Spanish seafood stewed rice with fish, shrimp, and flower branches with a little spicy and delicious.

The three -person party fried chicken has cumin spices, and the taste is very fragrant and tender ❤️❤️❤️

Next time I want to try the dessert 试

Original:
如果你正在尋找一家舒適且美味的餐酒館，我強烈推薦你去試試位於公館的這家酒吧，輕鬆與氣氛輕鬆愉快的空間。

這家餐酒館提供了幾道特定美食選擇，這次點了鹹派與鹹湯令人印象深刻與感動。

除了美食，Bar FEST還擁有一很多特調之調酒，這次點了諾曼第，來自法國鄉村蘋果果汁風味的清新調酒，第一口道最後一口的層次變化，帶出果香味。啡禮特調，把咖啡香氣與煙燻酒氣混合，讓人一口接一口。

這家酒吧的服務非常友好和專業，您可以在這裡享受優質的用餐體驗。無論是與朋友、家人或商務夥伴，Bar FEST都是一個完美的場所。推薦給大家。
EN:
If you are looking for a comfortable and delicious dining tavern, I strongly recommend you to try the bar in the mansion in the mansion, relaxed and relaxed and happy.

This restaurant provides several specific food options, which is impressive and impressive this time to order Xianpai and Xian Tang.

In addition to food, BAR FEST also has a lot of special bartending. This time, I ordered Normani. The fresh bartending of apple juice flavors from the French rural village.The aroma of coffee is mixed with smoky wine, making people take a bite.

The service of this bar is very friendly and professional, you can enjoy a high -quality dining experience here.Whether it is friends, family or business partners, Bar Fest is a perfect place.Recommended to everyone.

Original:
台北的另一顆隱藏寶石。
位置非常方便，靠近綠線公館站，仍然很容易經過，從街上看不到這個酒吧。
很棒的雞尾酒和甜點，那裡的氣氛甚至更好。
丹尼斯和傑德是很棒的人，有著善良的靈魂🫶他們會向你推薦飲料以及搭配什麼🤌🍸🍮
EN:
Another hidden gem in Taipei.
The location is very convenient. It is still easy to pass by the Green Line Mansion Station. This bar cannot be seen from the street.
A great cocktail and dessert, the atmosphere there is even better.
Dennis and Jed are great people, with good souls 🫶 What will they recommend drinking and matching you?

Original:
Bar Fest是一家不錯的小酒吧，有著簡單而舒適的氛圍和室內裝飾，提供令人愉悅的飲料和甜點。
特別感謝他們舉辦烏克蘭志工活動，讓台灣民眾有機會品嚐烏克蘭美食。
身為一個烏克蘭人，我給他們的食物打高分！
好工作！
EN:
Bar Fest is a good bar, with a simple and comfortable atmosphere and interior decoration, which provides pleasant drinks and desserts.
Special thanks to them for holding Ukrainian volunteers to give Taiwanese people the opportunity to taste Ukrainian cuisine.
As a Ukrainian, I give their food high!
Good job!

Original:
在這家酒吧喝一杯，體驗不一樣的體驗！非常棒，團隊也非常熱情。
去和丹尼斯談談，他會和你分享他在法國的烹飪經驗。你用法語改變了我。
和一個朋友一起去了那裡，度過了一段愉快的時光。
EN:
Drink a drink in this bar, experience a different experience!Great, the team is also very enthusiastic.
To talk to Dennis, he will share his cooking experience in France with you.You changed me in French.
I went there with a friend and spent a happy time.

Original: 丹尼斯製作美味的飲料和美味的食物。我們真的很喜歡和他聊天。非常強烈推薦！
